channel.title: Need help from advanced coders!
channel.description:
i have a server and a client....
But i cant stand hamachi or no-ip... what im thinking is a webclient. i need help making one. I have a server,im using php-fusion if that isint compatible il change to something else. So im asking how to: *Emb the client,where to upload it? WTF to do lol? *make When people register at my website a char would be created on my server.And when they try to login non-registered they get a message invalid username or pass. *make my server allways online (on my server) (if isint possible this doesnt go with the 100k )
Im a good learner though im not very good of a coder.... but il do what i must and I MOSTLY NEED THE WEBCLIENT
ANYONE THAT HELPS ME IN all of my questions (and that they all work properly) gets 100k rs2 gp.
Thanks
